dc_title_s: Economically Active and Inactive Population, Guatemala, 2014
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains statistics on categories of economically active and inactive persons from the 2014 Census of Guatemala. The census information was collected by the Instituto Nacional de Estadisticas in Guatemala in April of 2014. The questionnaire and survey report for this census is included with this download. These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. East View Cartographic, Inc. and Instituto Nacional de Estadisticas (Guatemala).(2018). Economically Active and Inactive Population, Guatemala, 2014. East View Cartographic, Inc. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/ts259pv7948. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
